channel.title: Specials Fatal Error Help
channel.description:
Well, I never noticed this before, so I guess this is new..
I logged on and started walking around, thinking what I could add to my source next. I got bored of thinking and went to the shops. I bought a Dragon Dagger (s). I clicked the special bar, and I disconnected.. I checked the logs, and I got this.. VVVV
[img]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/9350/errorpls1dm1.png[/img]
Well, I have no idea what it could be. I've checked the lines that it says to in the logs, but I still can't seem to find the problem.
Help is appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Specials Fatal Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

Hmm alright… But my specials were fine a while ago… I don’t recall doing anything to them, except for maybe the timers… I’ll just try to play around with them. Thanks for the help anyway guys.

EDIT: Nope… I can’t figure out the damn problem. It’s pissed me off for like 4 days now… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Specials Fatal Error Help
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

The method leads to a null. So it aborts the socket for a second.

Read full topic

item.title: Specials Fatal Error Help
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“pinkyownz all, post:4, topic:199872”][quote author=Owner Zerk link=topic=264541.msg2186952#msg2186952 date=1208222582]

that’s messed up, i’m not sure try umm idk good luck ;D

Thanks for the help… Trying to get yourself some Count are we?
[/quote]
Wow, i hate people like you, just because your trying to be friendly doesn’t mean you want post count, i can fricken’ help you if you tell me exactly what’s happening or what you added to the source. just stop saying that to people, JESUS CHRIST!!![/quote]

Oh fuck off. You think we don’t notice you adding to your post count on every help thread? Pretending you know the answer.

Don’t even quote or reply to this, I’ll cut off your ballsack and feed it to your mother.

Sorry to ruin your thread Zerk, but that [i]had to be said.

Read full topic

Helping area

zerk can i ask where is the problem client side or server side?

if in server side you might have a wrong code in the spec area of client.java if client side could be still in ur client.java

send me ur spec codes dat r glitched and ill have a look on whats wrong
